name: Truck Driving Car Transport
description: Transport multiple cars and be the best offroad driver in driving games. Get ready for an awesome driving experience in OffRoad Multi Car Truck Transporter 2018. It's time to show your perfect driving skills while driving a heavy duty transporter. You have to drive your truck very carefully avoiding the traffic. Play as the real driver & a car transporter. Drive very smoothly and make sure to reach on the required destination point to unload your cargo. All you have to do is play this game and deliver cars to its destination. Successfully complete the mission and be the professional cargo truck driver.
